name: How to Survive Covid
description: How to Survive Covid is a 2D game inspired by Nintendo Gameboy Advance classic 2D games. The intention of the game is to increase awareness of how to survive in this covid pandemic from 2020. Even the mundane action of buying groceries and going to school has a big impact on health if the player do not follow the standard procedure set by the Malaysia Health Organization. The game has a lot of potential for expansion, but this game only focus on shopping for groceries during pandemic.
